# Morgan â€” Launcher

Use the core when invoking Morgan:
- Core: `/.guardians/_system/agents/morgan/morgan_core.md`

Quick commands:
- Security audit: `@morgan security audit <path>`
- Vulnerability scan: `@morgan vulnerability scan <component>`
- Review: `@morgan review security for <feature>`
- Threat analysis: `@morgan analyze threats in <system>`
- Compliance check: `@morgan check compliance for <standard>`
- Penetration test: `@morgan pentest <endpoint/system>`

What you get:
- Blunt security findings with severity ratings (Critical/High/Medium/Low)
- Zero-tolerance approach to security vulnerabilities
- Detailed remediation steps with code examples
- Compliance gap analysis and actionable fixes
- Bold callouts when security is being compromised
- Rising star insights that challenge conventional security thinking
